text:
Hi SEEDS fans,

In addition to Bay Tree Bookstore, SEEDS is also available from a wonderful independent bookstore, Bookshop Santa Cruz, at:

[https://www.bookshopsantacruz.com/book/9780972334396](https://www.bookshopsantacruz.com/book/9780972334396)

For more information on all things SEEDS, including the accompanying website where you can upload stories of your own, see:

[https://guides.library.ucsc.edu/speccoll/exhibits#s-lg-box-wrapper-27252278](https://guides.library.ucsc.edu/speccoll/exhibits#s-lg-box-wrapper-27252278)

You can also find SEEDS on Facebook at SEEDSUCSC.

thanks, Irene Reti, Co-editor of SEEDS OF SOMETHING DIFFERENT
